channel.title: 2 duping glitches [PI]
channel.description: 1- when i player gets killed a quickly teleports to a place with no enemys and spam clicks there items they get numerous of that item 2- when i player dies in the wilderness and say is not skulled and keeps his whip it will still drop for the other player does anyone have a fix for these because i cannot seem to get it

it takes5 secs on dead emote but i died kept d bow went back and there was another d bow on the ground

item.title: 2 duping glitches [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

  1. Make the items drop before the dead player does the ‘dead’ emote, the player who is doing the ‘dead’ emote make him not able to move for 5 seconds or be able to pick up anything for 5 seconds, (tested, worked on my old source)
  2. post your death method, and your Gifelife method
